title: What She Wants for Christmas
description: Librarian Note: This edition's ISBN is in conflict with another's in the database - Brazilian Affair.All she wants under her Christmas tree is this man! Joe Hughes.He's gorgeous, strong, passionate...with the kind of intensely private quality that's a challenger to any self-respecting woman.Not that Teresa really needs another challenger in her life. She's just moved to a small town in Washington, and while her young son thinks it's "cool", her teenage daughter says she hates the place. Worse, although Teresa's a darn good vet, the local farmers won't let her treat their livestock.Still, Teresa can't resist loving Joe. Even when she learns Joe's keeping a secret that threatens her happiness. And his own....
author: Janice Kay Johnson
